Articles.Content: Has anyone had a problem on the launcher where the update part just keeps flashing checking for updates and never stops? if so how do u fix this problem?
The launcher is consistently broken. The best way is to open the KSP application directly through the folder, although it sorta depends what OS you're running.

> 
> The launcher is consistently broken. The best way is to open the KSP application directly through the folder, although it sorta depends what OS you're running.

^ This.

Quote from *Induction To Construction*, "Save yourself some time and save your computer the work Ã¢â‚¬â€œ ignore Launcher.exe"

I regular open game throught folder shortcut but i open the launcher when i want to see if there is a update i need to install. When i open instaer if just keeps flashin checkin for update. I can open the actual game just fine. Thank u for replies.
